additional_info.software_domain: software fault prediction using source code metrics
limitations: The effect of feature selection techniques has increased the performance in few cases, however, in the maximum cases it is negligible or even the worse.
Naïve Bayes performed the worst accuracy among the machine learning techniques.
SVM could not perform well with multidimensional reduction in this case.
future_directions: Similar nature of studies with large scale software could be performed to generalize and validate the results that is obtained by this study.
